body.name: Steam & Go - Demineralized Water for Steam Cleaner, PVC-Free Floor Cleaner Liquid Compatible With Any Mop Steamer, Ready-to-Use Multisurface Cleaner, Scented Mop Solution, Eucalyptus Mint, 32 oz

features: POWERHOUSE MOPPING SOLUTION - Maximize the filtration of your steam machine. Use Steam & Go’s demineralized water multi-surface cleaner. Our floor cleaning solution removes spills, dirt, and other residues to keep your floor smelling and looking clean.
READY TO USE - No more hassle packaging and complicated shower tile cleaner mixing! Use this mop-cleaning solution as is. Just twist the cap open, pour it into your steamer for floors, and mop away.

PROVIDES A REFRESHING SCENT THAT LASTS - Besides keeping your surfaces squeaky clean, this PVC-free mop cleaner adds a touch of fragrance to your living space. It’s available in Lavender, Tropical Bloom, Eucalyptus Mint, and Clean Ocean scents.

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY - Looking for the perfect cleaning solution for your steam floor cleaner? Look no further! Steam & Go’s mop solution for floor cleaning works with any electric floor mop and is suitable for different sealed floors and surfaces.

CONTAINS ONLY CLEAN INGREDIENTS - Worry no more about harmful house cleaner solutions because our demineralized water has none. This planet-friendly all surface cleaner is biodegradable and does not contain PVC materials.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Scented Demineralized Water Our 100% demineralized water will leave your floors smelling fresh and clean! It also optimizes the performance of your steam mop. Perfect for use with your steam mop on any sealed floors or surfaces. Transform your cleaning routine for a refreshing clean every time.

Fresh scented multi-surface floor cleaner Immerse yourself in the refreshing scent that transforms your cleaning routine into a revitalizing spa-like experience. Formulated to perfection, this pure and pristine water leaves your floors and surfaces fresh and clean.

Demineralized Steam Mop Water Eucalyptus Mint Infused with the delightful essence of eucalyptus and mint. Elevate your cleaning game with the enchanting aroma of our Eucalyptus Mint demineralized water. Demineralized Steam Mop Water Clean Ocean With Clean Ocean scent, you can confidently clean and refresh your home, leaving behind a pristine and hygienic environment. Experience the future of cleaning with Clean Ocean demineralized water and discover a new level of efficiency and effectiveness. Demineralized Steam Mop Water Tropical Bloom With Tropical Bloom scent, you can enjoy a rejuvenating burst of tropical fragrance while effectively cleaning and deodorizing your surfaces. Fresh results every time. Demineralized Steam Mop Water Lavender Infused with the calming essence of lavender, our specialized formula not only effectively cleans but also fills your space with a serene and relaxing aroma. Experience the gentle yet effective cleaning action of Lavender demineralized water as it effortlessly removes dirt, grease, and grime while creating a relaxing environment. Elevate your cleaning routine with the essence of lavender and transform your home into a sanctuary of cleanliness and calmness.

Better than using regular water Enhance steam cleaning with our demineralized water for optimal performance. Purified to remove impurities and minerals, it delivers clean, residue-free steam. Enjoy efficient, long-lasting use, with no clogging or scale buildup. Elevate your routine with our scented demineralized water.

Why Choose Us? Convenient Feature Skip the hassle of packaging and mixing with our mop cleaning solution. Just twist, pour, and mop away with ease. Scented Demineralized Water Available in Lavender, Tropical Bloom, Eucalyptus Mint, and Clean Ocean scents. Experience the benefits of a fresh, clean home and a pleasant scent. No Harmful Chemicals Enjoy the peace of mind that comes with using our demineralized water, knowing that you're making a smart choice for a cleaner and healthier home. Works Great on Any Floors Perfectly suitable for a variety of sealed floors and surfaces, making it a versatile choice for your cleaning needs.

Choose your go-to scent Eucalyptus Mint Fills your home with the enchanting aroma of cool minty breeze with the soothing essence of eucalyptus, creating a truly refreshing and clean routine. Lavender Immerse yourself in the calming aroma of lavender. Our demineralized water offers a deep clean and leaves a lingering, serene fragrance. Clean Ocean Bringing the refreshing ocean essence to your home. Experience a deep clean and the refreshing scent of the ocean with our demineralized water. Tropical Bloom Experience the transformative power of the Tropical Bloom scent as it brings you to a paradise getaway, making your cleaning routine a refreshing one.

The Cleaning Partners Steam Cleaner Lavender Bundle Multi-surface cleaner Scrubbing Mop Pads Description Experience the ultimate cleaning duo that leaves surfaces fresh and immaculate. Description Experience the power of our scented cleaners and elevate your cleaning routine. Description These pads effortlessly tackle tough messes and spills. Reusable and washable. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This smells really good. Makes the floor clean and won't clog up the steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product works great, has a light scent but only was able to use 1 time for whole house. Need to be a larger size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works in wood floor steam cleaner
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to go with the Bissell steam floor cleaner. I also purchased distilled water after using this. They are the same. No scent I could smell. The bottle is much smaller than it appears online.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No Smell at all, Picture of container looks like a gallon but it's not
reviews.reviewText: Does good job not leaving a film, there is no scent and size is deceiving

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for shark steam mop
reviews.reviewText: So I got this for my shark steam mop and I just used a little bit of this for smell and then used the distilled water. Smells great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money.
reviews.reviewText: You don't even smell the eucalyptus at all. And it comes in a small bottle. It looks much bigger in the ad, so it's definitely a rip-off.
